name: NPR
text:
Uber is buying Postmates in a $2.65 billion all-stock deal, as the company sees falling demand for rides. With the acquisition, UberEats will represent 37% of food delivery services in the U.S.
https://t.co/VDnRyqA7l9

name: NPR
text:
The border between Australian states Victoria and New South Wales will close due to a coronavirus outbreak.

Victoria, whose capital city is Melbourne, logged 127 cases in 24 hours â€” 90% of Australia's infections during that period.
